title: rOhiNEyaam
sahitya:
rOhiNEyAm budham rUpajita manmatha m





anupallavi



 mOha mAyAtItam mOdamaya vigraham dEhi shOkApaham divya kavi tAvaham 



caraNam

 pustakaram citakaram pUta maNimaya makuTam mastakam kanyakA mithuna rAshyadhipatim

nistula dayA makuTa niravadya sumatim shasta harikEsha ghana shAsanAncita gatim
